books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood. Originally published in 2005 and the basis of a forthcoming movie.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by Al Franken
books.description: A memoir by the Democratic senator from Minnesota and former “Saturday Night Live” writer and performer.
books.name: AL FRANKEN, GIANT OF THE SENATE

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by Jeff Flake
books.description: The Arizona senator defends traditional conservative values, says the movement has lost its way and calls for a return to principle.
books.name: CONSCIENCE OF A CONSERVATIVE

books.author: by Walter Lord
books.description: The story of the heroic evacuation of British troops in 1940, retold in a current movie. Originally published in 1982.
books.name: THE MIRACLE OF DUNKIRK

books.author: by Dinesh D'Souza
books.description: The conservative commentator argues that the American left is a fascist threat.
books.name: THE BIG LIE

books.author: by Joshua Green
books.description: A deeply reported account of the relationship between Donald Trump and his chief strategist, Steve Bannon.
books.name: DEVIL'S BARGAIN

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg and Adam Grant
books.description: Sandberg’s experience after her husband’s sudden death and Grant’s psychological research combine to provide insight on facing adversity and building resilience.
books.name: OPTION B

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Joshua Levine
books.description: The history behind the current movie.
books.name: DUNKIRK

books.author: by Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa by the comedian, now the host of “The Daily Show.”
books.name: BORN A CRIME

books.author: by Mark R. Levin
books.description: The radio host argues that the founding fathers would be shocked by the expansion of modern government.
books.name: REDISCOVERING AMERICANISM

books.author: by Kate Fagan
books.description: The story behind the suicide of Madison Holleran, a student athlete at the University of Pennsylvania.
books.name: WHAT MADE MADDY RUN
